CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Charges__c)="Incentive",0-(Unit_Price__c*Quantity__c), IF(TEXT(Charges__c)="Terminal Rental Fee Per Terminal",(Unit_Price__c*Recurring_Quantity__c), IF(TEXT(Charges__c)="SIM Rental",(Unit_Price__c*Recurring_Quantity__c), IF(TEXT(Charges__c)="Gateway Recurring Fee",(Unit_Price__c*Recurring_Quantity__c), IF(TEXT(Charges__c)="Service & Support Recurring Fee Per Location",(Unit_Price__c*Recurring_Quantity__c), IF(TEXT(Charges__c)="Service & Support Recurring Fee Per Terminal",(Unit_Price__c*Recurring_Quantity__c), IF(TEXT(Charges__c)="Terminal Managed Services Per Terminal",(Unit_Price__c*Recurring_Quantity__c), IF(TEXT(Charges__c)="Token Service Support Per Merchant",(Unit_Price__c*Recurring_Quantity__c), IF(TEXT(Charges__c)="Gateway Processing Per Location",(Unit_Price__c*Recurring_Quantity__c), IF(TEXT(Charges__c)="Gateway Processing Per Terminal",(Unit_Price__c*Recurring_Quantity__c), IF(TEXT(Charges__c)="Other" && TEXT(Type__c)<>"One Off",(Unit_Price__c*Recurring_Quantity__c), Unit_Price__c * Quantity__c)))))))))))
CustomField.label: Total Price
